subject: How to get started to configure pedals with games?
description_text:
Hello,

Sorry I'm new to this. How do games detect the pedals? I don't see any videos on how to configure the pedals with Forza 5 and other popular games. DO I need 3rd party software like Freejoy? I've found also something called Forza Emuwheel. Do I need to use these softwares?

Thanks,
Sebastien

conversations.body_text: Hi Sebastien Prompt,  Have you downloaded SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.9? We recommend performing a full calibration or test of your pedals. Here is the download link for your convenience:      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Yes, I have but  I have a hard time pressing on the break pedal:

Does that look normal?

[cid:4f0894fa-bf07-4fee-b428-ba1f54ff8203]


________________________________
Hi Sebastien Prompt,    Please take a photo of your brake pedal installation so I can take a look at the setup.

I need to press real hard to get it to move...
Thanks for the help,

Sebastien

Hi Sebastien Prompt,    This is normal. Without a supporting seat, the typical pedal force ranges from 40 to 60 kg. After calibration, the full 100% input can be achieved — that’s the purpose of calibration, as everyone’s pedal force and installation setup may vary.

You could have mentioned that there was a white elastomer with less force. Anyway, I found it on your web site. Appreciate all the help though!
